result.markdown:
---
title: "Overview"
author: "Joey Stanley"
date: 2023-10-23
date-modified: last-modified
---




This page just has a summary of all the hymns and their frequency stats, including the new hymns. I will update this page regularly as I collect more data. 

## Quick Facts

I currently have data from 22,822 sacrament meetings. If you were to attend that many, it would take roughly 475.5 years---so, more than a couple lifetimes' worth of data. It's also the equivalent of the entire 39-year lifetime of the 1985 hymnal in 12.19 wards. This data comes from 1,138 wards, mostly in the United States. Across all these meetings, there are 78,207 hymns. See [here](/posts/frequency-data) for a detailed breakdown of how this data is distributed across time and space, as well as an explanation of where it call came from.
